text: int main ( ) { int n ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; int t , j , b , sum , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < ( i + 1 ) ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
